title: Booking.com Property Listing Guide: Maximize Hotel and Rental Bookings
description: Complete guide to listing your property on Booking.com. Learn setup, optimization, and management strategies for hotels, B&Bs, and vacation rentals.

seo.title: Booking.com Property Guide 2024 | Complete Setup & Optimization Tutorial
seo.description: Learn how to list and optimize your property on Booking.com. Comprehensive guide for hotels, B&Bs, and vacation rentals to maximize bookings and revenue.

sections.title: Register Your Property on Booking.com
sections.content:
Visit join.booking.com to start the registration process. Booking.com accepts various property types including hotels, B&Bs, apartments, vacation rentals, and unique accommodations.

Registration Requirements:

  • Valid business registration and tax information
  • Property address and contact details
  • Bank account information for payments
  • Property photos and descriptions
  • Room types and pricing information

Property Types Accepted: Hotels, motels, B&Bs, guesthouses, apartments, vacation homes, villas, hostels, and unique properties like treehouses or boats.

The approval process typically takes 24-72 hours, during which Booking.com reviews your property information and photos.
tips: Ensure all business licenses and permits are current before applying
Prepare high-quality photos before starting the registration process
Have your property's unique selling points clearly defined

sections.title: Complete Property Information and Setup
sections.content:
Once approved, access your Partner Hub to complete your property setup:

Property Details:

  • Accurate property description highlighting unique features
  • Complete address and GPS coordinates
  • Check-in/check-out times and policies
  • Cancellation policies and payment terms
  • Property facilities and amenities

Room Configuration:

  • Create room types with detailed descriptions
  • Set maximum occupancy and bed configurations
  • Define room amenities and features
  • Upload room-specific photos
  • Set base rates and availability

Policies and Rules: Clearly define house rules, pet policies, smoking policies, and any age restrictions.
tips: Be specific about amenities - guests search by these filters
Include local attractions and distances in your description
Set realistic check-in times to avoid guest disappointment

sections.title: Upload and Optimize Property Photos
sections.content:
High-quality photos are crucial for attracting bookings on Booking.com. Properties with professional photos receive 30% more bookings than those with amateur photos.

Essential Photo Types:

  • Property exterior and entrance
  • Reception/lobby area
  • All room types from multiple angles
  • Bathrooms (clean and well-lit)
  • Common areas (restaurant, pool, gym)
  • Local area and nearby attractions

Photo Requirements:

  • Minimum resolution: 1024x768 pixels
  • Maximum file size: 5MB per image
  • JPEG format preferred
  • No watermarks or text overlays
  • Bright, natural lighting

Upload at least 20-30 photos to give guests a comprehensive view of your property.
tips: Take photos during the day with natural lighting
Show the property at its best - clean, tidy, and well-staged
Include photos of unique features that set you apart

sections.title: Set Competitive Pricing and Manage Availability
sections.content:
Effective pricing strategy is crucial for maximizing revenue and occupancy on Booking.com:

Pricing Strategies:

  • Research competitor rates in your area
  • Consider seasonal demand and local events
  • Implement dynamic pricing based on demand
  • Offer early booking discounts
  • Set minimum stay requirements for peak periods

Availability Management:

  • Keep your calendar updated in real-time
  • Use channel manager to sync across platforms
  • Set stop-sales for maintenance periods
  • Manage overbooking risks carefully

Rate Plans: Create different rate plans (non-refundable, flexible, breakfast included) to appeal to different guest segments.
tips: Update prices regularly based on demand and competition
Use Booking.com's rate intelligence tools for market insights
Consider offering packages (breakfast, parking) for higher revenue

sections.title: Manage Bookings and Guest Communications
sections.content:
Excellent guest service leads to positive reviews and repeat bookings:

Booking Management:

  • Confirm bookings promptly
  • Send pre-arrival information and instructions
  • Manage modifications and cancellations professionally
  • Handle special requests when possible

Guest Communication:

  • Respond to messages within 24 hours
  • Provide local recommendations and assistance
  • Address complaints quickly and professionally
  • Follow up after checkout for feedback

Review Management: Encourage satisfied guests to leave reviews and respond professionally to all reviews, both positive and negative.
tips: Use Booking.com's messaging system for all guest communications
Create template responses for common questions
Always aim to exceed guest expectations

sections.title: Optimize Performance and Increase Visibility
sections.content:
Continuously optimize your listing to improve search ranking and booking conversion:

Booking.com Ranking Factors:

  • Guest review scores (aim for 8.5+)
  • Booking conversion rate
  • Cancellation rate (keep low)
  • Response time to guest messages
  • Photo quality and quantity
  • Competitive pricing

Optimization Strategies:

  • Regularly update property description and amenities
  • Add new photos seasonally
  • Participate in Booking.com programs (Genius, Preferred Partner)
  • Offer value-added services
  • Monitor and improve guest satisfaction scores

Performance Monitoring: Use Partner Hub analytics to track performance metrics and identify improvement opportunities.
tips: Aim for Preferred Partner status for increased visibility
Regularly check your competition and adjust strategy accordingly
Invest in property improvements based on guest feedback
